title: MAG 056 - Children of the Night Transcript
text:
re me. 

The Magnus Archives –056 – Children of the Night 
19 
 
ARCHIVIST 
Fire you? Fine. 
MARTIN 
I... I lied on my CV. 
ARCHIVIST 
What? 
MARTIN 
I don’t have a masters in parapsychology. I don’t even have a degree. When I 
was 17, my mum, she had… Look, she had some problems and I ended up 
dropping out of school, trying to support us. I tried everything, but nowhere 
was hiring. So, I just kind of started to lie on my applications. Sending them out 
to just about anywhere. For some reason, my lie about my parapsychology got 
me an interview with Elias and then a, a job here. M-most of my employment 
details are made up. I’m only 29. 
ARCHIVIST 
Right. I... uh... I believe you. 
MARTIN 

The Magnus Archives –056 – Children of the Night 
20 
 
Why are you smiling? 
ARCHIVIST 
Yes, I just... um, I won’t mention it to Elias. Just between us. 
MARTIN 
So, you... don’t mind? 
ARCHIVIST 
To be quite honest, Martin, I’m... I’m really rather relieved. 
[Tape clicks off.]

licence. 
Today’s episode was written by Jonathan Sims and directed by Alexander J 
Newall. 
It featured: Jonathan Sims as The Archivist and Alexander J Newall as Martin 
Blackwood.
